# Station Alert - Epsilon
[italic]Called by: Central Command Only.[/italic]
[bold]Conditions:[/bold]
Central Command has deemed it necessary to terminate all contracts.
[bold]Security:[/bold]
Security and the rest of the station are to fend for themselves. All contracts are terminated and nothing is required to act upon.
[bold]Secure Areas:[/bold]
The entire station is considered a secure area.
All Secure Areas are to be bolted down. Secure Areas may be left unbolted at the discretion of any personnel with access to do so.
[bold]General Crew:[/bold]
All personnel are no longer required to maximize suit sensors. Do so at your discretion.
All personnel are no longer required to remain in any Department.
Visitors of the station, anyone without Central Command access, are to fend for themselves along with the station crew.
Personnel are no longer required to follow instructions from any other person.
